scripts.generate:example: cargo run --bin sui client-gen -m examples/gen.toml -o examples/gen
scripts.generate:tests: cargo run --bin sui client-gen -m tests/gen.toml -o tests/gen
scripts.generate:move: cargo run --bin sui move build -p move/amm && cargo run --bin sui move build -p move/examples
scripts.generate: pnpm run generate:move && pnpm run generate:example && pnpm run generate:tests
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm generate && pnpm type-check && vitest run tests
scripts.lint: pnpm run eslint:check && pnpm run prettier:check
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run eslint:fix && pnpm run prettier:fix
